_description: What depends on what. CHECK THIS BEFORE DELETING OR MODIFYING ANYTHING.

critical_mappings.note: Scheduler dispatches jobs BY NAME. If job name missing from jobs.json, that research topic produces nothing.
Same pattern as overnight. Maps job names to display names.
Reads needs_repair flag and failed job list from cycle reporter
Reads feed entries, writes scores to feed-quality-scores.jsonl
Reads both via claude -p, writes daily-synthesis.md and research-priorities.md
Reads all to build dashboard data, pushes to GitHub every 5min
MUST restart gateway after changes to either file. Also purge sessions.
Local models limited to 6 tools. NEVER give full 24-tool set. Write tool REMOVED.
Tailscale funnel proxies 443→8100. Launchd auto-restarts. MCP watchdog every 5min.

file_relationships.~/.openclaw/openclaw.json: Gateway config. Models, tools, byProvider restrictions. Gateway restart required after changes.
file_relationships.~/.openclaw/cron/jobs.json: All OpenClaw cron jobs. Scheduler maps job names to UUIDs. Gateway restart required after changes.
file_relationships.~/zeke-scheduler.py: Main orchestrator. Runs overnight/daytime/reason windows. DO NOT patch incrementally — rewrite sections completely.
file_relationships.~/.openclaw/workspace/memory/learning-fe: THE critical file. 1174 entries. NEVER overwrite. Append only via exec >>.
file_relationships.~/zeke-status/: Dashboard data. Pushed to GitHub every 5min. Memory system lives here too.

openclaw_cron_jobs.note: L2 rebuild on 2/26 broke all research jobs by using wrong field names
